Click to donate

Eight Tone Wallpaper(ETW) contains many popular live wallpaper on the market. Most of it downloaded over one million or even tens of millions in the Google Play store. ETW brings them together and removes their ads and presents them in a refreshing way, greatly enhance the user experience. At the same time, ETW has optimized many wallpapers to improve their performance and compatibility and reduce the power consumption of some live wallpapers.

In addition to live wallpaper, ETW also contains a variety of art paintings(Style wallpaper), and you can also use art to beautify your mobile phone desktop.

ETW provides a developer SDK to support interested wallpaper developers to develop live wallpaper. ETW also open source for developers to learn to communicate.

When new wallpapers are released, ETW will be updated within 24 hours.

If you have any comments or suggestions, or you need ETW\'s source code, please e-mail to the developer: jinkg@live.cn

Visit home page

Live wallpapers are developed by different developers.

Use them may give you the equipment to bring different power consumption, performance consumption, even crash.

If you find such a problem, you can switch to other wallpaper, or contact App developers.

jinkg@live.cn
Visit home page
